name: Fly in the Darkness
description:
Fly in the Darkness is a different kind of arcade game, very challenging, that combines the difficulty of arcade style with a dark art and an engaging story. The game tells the story of Benjamin Fly, a boy that when was very young lost his parents and has since gone to live in an orphanage (The Backster Orphanage). In one of his pranks Benjamin gets involved with something surprising that leads him to a magical journey filled of adventures.

Fly through the Darkness, avoid many obstacles and traps and discover new environments. Try to go as far as you can, unlock each chapter of the story and embark along with Benjamin Fly on an adventure, full of dangers and secrets, through the Kingdom of Darkness!

WHAT TO EXPECT:

> Easy gameplay: Just one touch;

> Many environments and obstacles;

> Many ships to unlock in the dark hangar;

> Embark on an adventure with Benjamin Fly revealing the chapters of the Book;

> Find the secret pages and fly with the Crazy Book;

> Translation In-game: English and Portuguese (Others soon...).
